Again, we thank you for supporting Pacifica Online from the Nexus Pixels Team!

name: Bug report token
unknownCol2:
Awarded to the first player to report a certain bug.
The game developer reserves the right to decide how many tokens will be rewarded for each report depending on the criteria.

Critical - 8+ (ruins the whole game)
Very Important - 5-7 (invulnerability/super powers)
Important - 3-4 (abusive)
Bug - 2 (unexpected feature malfunction)
Mini-bug - 1 (errors/not working)

Only bugs that can be abused falls to Important+
User Interface bugs usually falls to mini-bug
We equally determine the time and date of reports from the desk.nexuspixels.com or Facebook messages.

name: Bloodbond
unknownCol2: Sacred knife used by [[Emperors] in Guild's blood-compact-ritual. Guild master is called [[Emperor], Guild is formed fundamentaly by 5 Persons, They are called The Order ([[Emperor] and 4 [[Generals]). Each Generals must have 1 [[[Bloodlust] while the [[Emperor] must carry the [[[Bloodbond]. The ritual must be done at the [Nurua village] infront of the [heroes' wall]. The [[Emperor] must form a Party with his 4 [[Generals] and click the Blood compact button at the buttom of the Guild window. Note: The Party leader will become the Guild's [[Emperor] while the 4 others will become the Generals of the guild. Guild can be up to 25 members only (Temporary) and only the [[Emperor] can invite members. Req's: [[Emperor] must be a 2nd class hero or above, [[General]s must be level 35 or above while NO level req for other members.

name: Valzeon Invasion absence memo
unknownCol2:
This is given to players who quit while the game session is still running. This is because leaving the game dramatically decreases your team mates' chance of winning, challenge and enjoyment.

You can still cope up and have this item removed from your inventory if you resumed the game within the time allowance specified in the mechanics.

However, if you happen not to attend back to the game, this item will remain and prevents you from receiving token reward in this game the next time you win.

You can also remove this by simply completing a game "Actively". Everything goes back to normal, you will receive tokens again after that.

name: Valzeon Invasion inactivity memo
unknownCol2:
This is given to players who have lower than 50% of the average activity of the team (based on running, attacking or supporting).

This is because being inactive in the game dramatically decreases your team mates' chance of winning, challenge and enjoyment.

This item prevents you from receiving token reward in this game the next time you win.

The only way to remove this is by simply completing a game "Actively". Everything goes back to normal, you will receive tokens again after that.

name: Starband
desc: A Christmas parol that was re-thinked and fashioned as a headgear. People who loves to wear this are usually the ones who think they outshine and outstand in everybody else in the crowd.

name: Boxtop
desc: The essence of Christmas is not just to give gifts but to give love. It's just so happen that giving gifts is one of many ways and also most popular way to do this. People who loves to wear this are usually someone who cares for everybody's happiness and tries to give them smile as a gift.

name: Bellband
desc: People who loves to wear this are usually fond of hearing bells on every music they hear even if it's not a Christmas song, makes them feel happy and active.

name: Too cold
desc: It's too cold every Christmas so it would be nice to have some headgear like this. People who loves to wear this usually feels they look a lot cuter than everybody else while wearing this!

name: Blues of Christmas
desc: Usually worn by girls during Christmas season while relaxing and listening to music. This is known to be given by boys to a special girl of their life because they believe it elevates their cuteness and beauty.

name: Rhythms of Christmas
desc: Usually worn by boys who belives playing Christmas songs in December is one way of appreciating the special season.

name: Xmas-tree hat
desc: This headgear become widely known after Eric thought it was nice to bring out a miniature of their family's Christmas tree to the party he attended in his childhood. People who loves to wear this are usually the type of person who don't want to miss any of good things (like Christmas trees) and happenings only present during December.

name: Xmas-box

name: Parol
desc: With this Christmas parol, you'll never miss the spirit of Christmas everyday!

name: Nexus Soul
desc: Establish a nexus (connection) between you and your daemon's soul, allowing them to attack your target (normal attack). Damage will be derived from you and your daemon's level.\n\nFull soul connection's strength can only be acheived when your level is equal or higher than your daemon.

name: Guise
desc:
An orb carrying a level 50 Dragon (first evolution).

This mythical dragon has been historically trained by swordsmen that serves as their mount for faster travelling and also weakens enemy's defense through it's fire breath.

They became great companions of swordsmen because their capabilities are highly compatible and helpful for them during battle.

name: Fury
desc:
An orb carrying a level 50 Wolf (first evolution).

Waifs' best friend that was prominently used through out the history of Pacifica after it was discovered by early warriors to be highly effective in weakening the dodge and mobility of their enemies.

This discovery led to wide adoption of wolves and have played major roles to notable battle events in our history.

name: Eden
desc:
An orb carrying a level 50 Falcon (first evolution).

Earliest scriptures in Pacifica described falcons as one of the deadliest signs of danger for those who are being hunted by archers.

Because of it's very sharp eyes, it can see any moving objects from a distant. No one can manage to escape from their eyes because of it's very fast flying speed.

A great extension of archer's vision.

name: Icarum
desc:
An orb carrying a level 50 Phoenix (first evolution).

A mythical bird that symbolizes life, chakra and resurrection.

Phoenix have been mysterious for being only found by people who have pure and profound reasons for their deeds throughout their life.

Considered to be the rarest type of bird animal in Pacifica that gives significant spiritiual boost to it's owner.

name: P-Cake
desc:
NOTE: Mana bonus and summoning is only effective on October 25-31 2013 (11:59PM Philippine Time) only as part of our 3rd anniversary.

Pastry king's Pride. Summons a mythical daemon oversoul - Pastry king.

Pastry king was executed by the terryans and imprisoned his soul inside the daemon's realm. To materialize his power, 8 heroes must wear this headgear along with other Pastry king helm set.

Pastry king would provide unlimited mana to 8 of the summonners ONLY IF they are all in the same map.

HOW TO SUMMON: This is letter the "P" in "PACIFICA", look for other heroes and assemble a party of 8 members. Make sure that everyone wears hat representing each letter in "PACIFICA".

TIP: The fastest way to find your partners is by going to Pacifica Fortress
